slide.title: Input Filtering - Future
slide.blurb: Nobody is going to use that hook! People don't seem to understand how to filter their input. We'll need to spoonfeed again.
slide.example:
<?php
    $name = pfilt(POST, 'name');  /* Default filter */
    $age  = pfilt(POST, 'age', PFILT_INTEGER);  
    $addr = pfilt(POST, 'addr', PFILT_TEXT, 'UTF-8');
?>
